description: This table contains information about Social Care decisions, which are stored as tracker records.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the decision record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category ID for the decision.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the financial assistance program for the decision.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the financial assistance program record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the financial assistance case associated with the decision.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for the decision.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Approved


Denied


Waiting for supervisor's approval


Pending Appeal


Overturned


Inactive


Entered in Error


Signed


Needs Review

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date when the decision was approved.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end date for the decision.

columns.name: DECISION_VALID_C_NAME
columns.description:
The validity type category ID for the decision.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fixed-term


Continuous


None

columns.name: DECISION_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note for the decision.

columns.name: REC_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the decision was created.

columns.name: INST_OF_UPDATE_1_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked.

columns.name: DECISION_NEGATIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the decision tracker is negative, which denies application for support.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PARENT_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service decision a related decision is linked to.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the responsible user for the decision.

columns.name: DECISION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user's login department at the time the decision was created.

columns.name: DECISION_COST_CENTER
columns.description: The cost center string generated for the decision.

columns.name: REG_ENCOUNTER_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the special encounter that stores registration information related to the service decision.
